argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_hilablo | |- +h e. AbelOp |
| 2 |  | #P_ablogrpo | |- ( +h e. AbelOp -> +h e. GrpOp ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- +h e. GrpOp |
| 4 |  | #P_ax-hfvadd | |- +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fdmi | |- dom +h = ( ~H X. ~H ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_grporn | |- ~H = ran +h |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` +h ) = ( GId ` +h ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_grpoidval | |- ( +h e. GrpOp -> ( GId ` +h ) = ( iota_ y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( GId ` +h ) = ( iota_ y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) |
| 10 |  | #P_hvaddid2 | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( 0h +h x ) = x ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. ~H ( 0h +h x ) = x |
| 12 |  | #P_ax-hv0cl | |- 0h e. ~H |
| 13 | 6 | #P_grpoideu | |- ( +h e. GrpOp -> E! y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- E! y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x |
| 15 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( y = 0h -> ( y +h x ) = ( 0h +h x ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( y = 0h -> ( ( y +h x ) = x <-> ( 0h +h x ) = x ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_ralbidv | |- ( y = 0h -> ( A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x <-> A. x e. ~H ( 0h +h x ) = x ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_riota2 | |- ( ( 0h e. ~H /\ E! y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) -> ( A. x e. ~H ( 0h +h x ) = x <-> ( iota_ y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) = 0h ) ) |
| 19 | 12, 14, 18 | #P_mp2an | |- ( A. x e. ~H ( 0h +h x ) = x <-> ( iota_ y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) = 0h ) |
| 20 | 11, 19 | #P_mpbi | |- ( iota_ y e. ~H A. x e. ~H ( y +h x ) = x ) = 0h |
| 21 | 9, 20 | #P_eqtri | |- ( GId ` +h ) = 0h |
